overview: A companion piece to the film IT’S ALL IN THE MIND commissioned through Channel 4 for their RANDOM ACTS strand.  This time however we are not land-locked, we are all-at-sea. Eden Kötting’s drawings and collages are aquatically themed featuring fish, boats and stars.  The work is a moving image celebration of the collages that Eden has been making with her father Andrew for the last five years.
title: All at Se̶e̶a
